channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Triconex Tricon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Triconex Tricon

item.title: CVE-2018-8872|2024-09-16T16:32:36.977Z -- schneider%20electric -- triconex%20tricon
item.description: In Schneider Electric Triconex Tricon MP model 3008 firmware versions 10.0-10.4, system calls read directly from memory addresses within the control program area without any verification. Manipulating this data could allow attacker data to be copied anywhere within memory.
